About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

My motivation

I started learning on January and since then there was not a single day I didn't write some code. I spend about 3-4 hours in average every day learning, practicing and studying how to code and program. My main source is Udemy.com and in addition I keep practicing on Codecademy, FreeCodeCamp and from Youtube videos. I can honestly say that I love to code!

I would not say about myself that I am a born problem solver but when it comes to coding I cannot stop until I figure out why something does not work the way I want it.

  • March 2020: Python

    From January to March I studied Python programming language which was a start to the whole world of programming.

  • April 2020: HTML & CSS

    I passed Web Development Course on Udemy from Colt Steele. This course gave me a basic understanding of web development fundamentals such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript coding and also a dive into back-end development with node and express and using nosql database.

  • June 2020: Javascript

    I took JavaScript course to practice more of programming in this lovely language.

  • July 2020: Advanced Javascript

    I also took advanced course for javascript with ES6+. This was to better understand some of the methods I used during learning React.

  • September 2020: ReactJS

    This course took me several months to finish as I was taking other course during this one. This course gave me knowledge of React, Hooks, Context and basics of NextJS.

  • Oct 2020: Advanced CSS & SASS

    As I was building some projects to show off I learned that I do not understand CSS and SASS as much as I would like to. This pushed me into taking course for advanced CSS and SASS to deepen my knowledge.
